About

Matches Between Energetic and the Real World

Energetic is developed to give everyone a chance to see the scope of changes and cooperation needed to transform the city's energy demand and supply in time to meet goals of the Paris Agreement.

What you’re seeing

The map experience links cards, events, and system impacts to help explore how interventions and real-world dynamics connect across time.

Privacy

Analytics and session replay are used to improve the experience. Where enabled, session replay may include canvas-based interactions.
